creditline: The C. Curtis Dunnavan Endowment for Asian Art
description: two islands; smaller island at left; sunset at left; two flying white cranes at left; teal trees; orange, yellow and white buildings; three figures seated at an orange table with tea on third panel from left; blue waves with whitecaps; block of text in black with red seal in URC

title: The Three Paradisiacal Isles
